document_data.name: Bruilhaven
document_data.mainbody: '''Bruilhaven''' was the opulent mansion and home home of the [[House Bruil]] in [[Melvaunt]] around [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Location: The mansion was located in the northwest section of Melvaunt.
document_data.Description: Ivy covered the exterior of the mansion. The interior was decorated with tastefully lavish furnishings.
document_data.Defenses: Fifteen men-at-arms were on duty at all times to guard the mansion.
